overview: Halkie Fulkee revolves around 9 ladies spend some quality time with each other periodically. When the time comes, will they stick through the bad times? When they are in a jogger's park or a restaurant or a movie theatre or a footpath, they make fun of everyone mangiest them and around to put a smile in this otherwise chaotic world.
tagline: Just one story of yours and mine .
title: Halkie Fulkee
